long_description: The CamelBak Venture Hydration Waistpack lets you comfortably carry water, energy gels and small essentials to keep you hydrated and energized on long runs and day hikes. Air-mesh nylon fabric harness with perforated foam increases ventilation and enhances comfort next to skin. Zippered compartment stores small essentials such as an energy bar, gels, phone, MP3 player, wallet and keys. 2 BPA-free, TruTaste(TM) 21 fl. oz. Podium Chill(R) bottles are held securely in insulated holsters. Bottles feature lightweight and squeezable bodies, double-wall insulation and innovative self-sealing caps. The CamelBak Venture Hydration Waistpack features an external bungee cord that lets you stow a light shell jacket, gloves or hat.
short_description: The CamelBak Venture Hydration Waistpack lets you comfortably carry water, energy gels and small essentials to keep you hydrated and energized on long runs and day hikes.
